title: Hyperconductor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Electrocute a player each night.
*Overloaded* â€” During the day, you may choose to fire on all cylinders. If you do, your ability will target every player in the game the next night. This is publicly announced at the end of the day.

- You may electrocute two players each full moon.
- Whenever you kill a player, your defense permanently increases by a tier.
